Question.Subject: how can I make a good thumbnail picture for twitter?
Question.Content: I've seen people with good quality photos as their default and mine always comes out all blurry :/ is there anything I can use to make a good looking thumbnail instead of letting twitter shrink my photos automaticaly?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
XnView is a utility for viewing and converting graphic files.
You can find a link to download it here: http://www.goinglogo.co.uk/index.html
Once you have downloaded it, open up the file, then from the menu select Image|resize.
Once you have it at the right size, do File|Save as
Its all straightforward from there.

Answer.Content:
XnView is a utility for viewing and converting graphic files.
You can find a link to download it here: http://www.goinglogo.co.uk/index.html
Once you have downloaded it, open up the file, then from the menu select Image|resize.
Once you have it at the right size, do File|Save as
Its all straightforward from there.
